definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: I wouldn't want my son to have a jailbait hanging around him.
sentences.chinese: 我可不想让个祸水妞跟我儿子整天出来进去的。

sentences.english: She's a beautiful girl—but beware, she's jailbait.
sentences.chinese: 她是个漂亮姑娘，但是要当心，可是个祸水妞儿啊。

sentences.english: She’s a beautiful girl—but beware, she’s jailbait.
sentences.chinese: 她是个漂亮姑娘，但是要当心，可是个祸水妞儿啊。

sentences.english: All say beauty is, what the crime as a beauty?
sentences.chinese: 都说红颜是祸水，红颜何罪？

sentences.english: The underworld is a peril to the area.
sentences.chinese: 这个黑社会组织是当地的一股祸水。

sentences.english: The world doesn’t need another gag about a girl with come in her hair.
sentences.chinese: 这个世界大可不必担心剃光头的女孩是诱人的祸水啦。

sentences.english: She wouldn't want her son to have a jailbait hanging around him.
sentences.chinese: 她不想让个祸水妞跟她的儿子整天出来进去的。

sentences.english: She is Helen of Troy in the quarrel.
sentences.chinese: 红颜祸水，这场争论因她而起。

definition: to damage the country and cause suffering to the people (idiom)
lit. capable of causing the downfall of a city or state (idiom)/fig. (of a woman) devastatingly beautiful
lit. capable of causing the downfall of a city or state (idiom)/fig. (of a woman) devastatingly beautiful/also written 傾城傾國|倾城倾国[qing1 cheng2 qing1 guo2]
divine fragrance, national grace (idiom); an outstanding beauty
